Headline: #56 Milwaukee Temporary Northbound Reroute near Milwaukee/Campbell
ShortDescription: NB 56 Milwaukee buses are temporarily rerouted via Milwaukee, Western, Fullerton, and Milwaukee due to, street blockage near Milwaukee/Campbell.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #56 Milwaukee buses are temporarily rerouted via Milwaukee, Western, Fullerton, and Milwaukee due to, street blockage near Milwaukee/Campbell.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Update: #52 Kedzie Temporary Southbound Reroute near Kedzie/Jackson
ShortDescription: Southbound 52 Kedzie buses are temporarily rerouted via Kedzie, Harrison, Sacramento, Jackson and Kedzie, due to street blockage near Kedzie/Jackson.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #52 Kedzie buses are temporarily rerouted via Kedzie, Harrison, Sacramento, Jackson and Kedzie, due to street blockage near Kedzie/Jackson.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
